text:
@AmitShah @narendramodi For importing faulty testing kits, for the exponential daily increse in COVID-19 infected cases, for being clueless on how to deal with economic distress, for alienating friendly Arab nations because your followers spew hate against them?
By safe Indians did you mean Sonal & Jay
